author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
The time has finally come! I've got my hands on BATTLETECH: GOTHIC. Let's dive in, see what this new alternate-reality game system has to offer in the world of big stompy robot combat and check out this variant rule system for the 40-Year-Old Mech classic. 

Check out the following three videos for a look at the Universe Book, Rules and Models!

Big thanks to Catalyst for the complimentary copies of the box to review. 

GMG is publicly supported. Become a backer on Patreon to ensure new content and that the Studio can continue: https://www.patreon.com/guerrillaminiaturegames 

Join us on DISCORD: https://discord.com/invite/XTqqxctryq

Want to challenge Ash to a game? Email him at GuerrillaMiniatureGames@gmail.com or message him through his Facebook Page!

Follow Ash on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/outofthebasementintothestreets

GMG Measuring Gauges and Tokens available HERE: http://deathraydesigns.com/product-category/accessories/guerrilla-miniature-games/

GMG T-Shirts and Hoo

title: GMG Reviews - Battletech: Gothic by Catalyst Game Labs (Part Two: The Universe Book)

author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
The time has finally come! I've got my hands on BATTLETECH: GOTHIC. Let's dive in, see what this new alternate-reality game system has to offer in the world of big stompy robot combat and check out this variant rule system for the 40-Year-Old Mech classic. 

Let's dive into part four as we round out the various elements of this boxed game by having a closer look at the models themselves. 

Check out the previous three videos for a look at the Box Universe Book and Rules!

Big thanks to Catalyst for the complimentary copies of the box to review.
